column1: West Little River is a census-designated place (CDP) in Miami-Dade County
Most of West Little River was originally a neighborhood of the City of Miami when it was annexed into the city of Miami in 1925. With the arrival of the Great Depression
column2: the City of Miami gave up its jurisdiction and West Little River became an unincorporated area of Miami-Dade County.

column1: West Little River is located at 25°51′25″N 80°14′13″W (25.856923
column2: -80.237020). West Little River borders the Miami neighborhoods of Pinewood and Miami Shores to the east
column4: and Gladeview and Liberty City to the south.
